item.title: Val Town Prototype Showcase
item.description: I've written about Val Town (a few times before). But it doesn't seem I've ever mentioned that the prototype of Collxn was written as a val. I'm a huge fan of the service for rapid ideation and prototyping. For a hackers-and-painters developer,]]>

item.title: No cloud required: local LLMs as a practical app dependency
